feed.title: Planka Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Planka: v1.23.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Description icon on front of cards
  • feat: Attachments icon on front of cards
  • fix: Format-agnostic time parsing
  • test: Setup UI test using BDD approach (#152)
  • test: Add BDD UI tests using Playwright (#911)
  • chore: Pin postgres version for docker-compose-db (#919)

New Contributors

  • @amrita-shrestha made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/152
  • @nabim777 made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/911
  • @sedationh made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/919

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plankanban/planka/compare/v1.23.2...v1.23.3

entry.title: New release for Planka: planka-0.2.13
entry.content: A Helm chart to deploy Planka and it's dependencies.

entry.title: New release for Planka: v1.23.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add multiple task creation with Ctrl+Enter (#921)
  • feat: Improve UX of comment actions (#924)
  • fix: Update Czech translation (#920)

New Contributors

  • @Zananok made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/921

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plankanban/planka/compare/v1.23.3...v1.23.4

entry.title: New release for Planka: v1.23.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Telegram bot notifications (#928)
  • fix: Include previous data state in webhook
  • fix: Save description when clicking outside

New Contributors

  • @Elllone made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/928
